io.druid.indexing.worker

Class WorkerCuratorCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.druid.indexing.worker.WorkerCuratorCoordinator

  • public class WorkerCuratorCoordinator
extends Object
    The CuratorCoordinator provides methods to use Curator. Persistent ZK paths are created on start().
